arts.ttl: Cyriel Dessers' real Rangers problem identified and it's the same one Adam Idah has at Celtic
arts.sum: Both the strikers were on target in 1-1 draw at Ibrox as Steven Naismith compares the hitman facing a similar issue

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton asks if Rangers have Glasgow bragging rights as Robbie Savage delivers blunt Celtic response
arts.sum: A 1-1 draw means the Ibrox club have taken seven points from their rivals this season and are unbeaten in their last three derbies

arts.ttl: Celtic are good at fouling and here's why Nick Walsh was right to deny raging Rangers bench a penalty
arts.sum: Our man Des Roache gives his view on all the key incidents from a surprisingly serene Old Firm derby

arts.ttl: Classy Celtic icon watches Rangers game in famous Hoops boozer as stunned punters all say the same thing
arts.sum: The Hoops hero took the time out to take snaps with punters as he watched the derby day spoils in the Brazen Head

arts.ttl: Overhyped Celtic stars shown up by rank rotten Rangers and Ibrox side are 5 signings off being title contenders - Hotline
arts.sum: Another Old Firm is all over but there's still plenty of shouting as Fraser Wilson discovered manning the phones.

arts.ttl: Celtic fan invades Rangers end as rogue punter huckled by stewards after breaking cover and waving scarf
arts.sum: One fan invaded enemy territory as Brendan Rodgers' team battled to a 1-1 draw at Ibrox

arts.ttl: Celtic deny Rangers a third straight Old Firm win
arts.sum: Adam Idah cancelled out Cyriel Dessers' opener to deny Rangers a third consecutive Old Firm derby victory as the arch-rivals played out a 1-1 draw.

arts.ttl: Callum McGregor laughs off Rangers penalty claim as Celtic captain argues 'it was a foul on me if anything'
arts.sum: The Rangers bench wanted a penalty but Nick Walsh waved it away and McGregor reckons the whistler got it right

arts.ttl: Adam Idah denies Rangers third straight Old Firm win with Celtic equaliser
arts.sum: Rangers 1-1 Celtic: Idah cancelled out a strike from Cyriel Dessers at Ibrox

arts.ttl: Ianis Hagi finds Celtic 'penalty' ally as Rangers bench told they are 'clutching' by ex ref after unseen eruption
arts.sum: The flashpoint was waved away by referee Nick Walsh inside the derby day cauldron
